NDEFMessage.summary: NOTE Experimental The NDEFMessage interface of the Web NFC API represents the content of an NDEF message that has been read from or could be written to an NFC tag. An instance is acquired by calling the NDEFMessage() constructor or from the property, which is passed to the event.

NDEFMessageRecords.summary:
NOTE Experimental The records property of
interface represents a list of s
present in the NDEF message.
NDEFMessageRecords.value: A list of object that represent data recorded in the message.

NDEFMessageNDEFMessage.summary: NOTE Experimental The NDEFMessage() constructor creates a new object, initialized with the given NDEF records.
